Script.name: CSSMan
Script.script:
-- CSSMan by Vadi. Public domain.
CSSMan = {} CSSMan.__index = CSSMan
function CSSMan.new(stylesheet) local obj = { stylesheet = {} } setmetatable(obj,CSSMan) local trim = string.trim
assert(type(stylesheet) == "string", "CSSMan.new: no stylesheet provided. A possible error is that you might have used CSSMan.new, not CSSMan:new")
for line in stylesheet:gmatch("[^\r\n]+") do local attribute, value = line:match("^(.-):(.-);$") if attribute and value then attribute, value = trim(attribute), trim(value) obj.stylesheet[attribute] = value end end
return obj end
function CSSMan:set(key, value) self.stylesheet[key] = value end
function CSSMan:get(key) return self.stylesheet[key] end
function CSSMan:getCSS(key) local lines, concat = {}, table.concat for k,v in pairs(self.stylesheet) do lines[#lines+1] = concat({k,": ", v, ";"}) end return concat(lines, "\n") end
function CSSMan:gettable() return self.stylesheet end
function CSSMan:settable(tbl) assert(type(tbl) == "table", "CSSMan:settable: table expected, got "..type(tbl))
self.stylesheet = tbl end

ScriptGroup.name: GUI
ScriptGroup.script:
USE_COLOURED_MAP_HACK = 1337 --set to 1337 for coloured map hack, else 0 (colour requires options mxp enabled=off) --LARGEFONT --> size 11 / wrap 41 -- MEDFONT --> size 10 / wrap 49 --SMALLFONT --> size 9 / wrap 57
MAPFONTSIZE = 15 MAPBGCOLOR = "black" MAPISBOLD = true
--satchel settings SATCHELFONTSIZE = 11 SATCHELLINEWRAP = 41 SATCHELBGCOLOR = "black" SATCHELISBOLD = true
--[[ --cloak settings CLOAKFONTSIZE = 9 CLOAKLINEWRAP = 57 CLOAKBGCOLOR = "purple" --]]
--inventory settings INVENTORYFONTSIZE = 9 INVENTORYLINEWRAP = 57 INVENTORYBGCOLOR = "black"
--score window settings SCORELINEWRAP = 47 SCOREFONTSIZE = 10 SCOREBGCOLOR = "black"
--chat window settings CHATLINEWRAP = 40 CHATFONTSIZE = 11 CHATBGCOLOR = "black"
HPBAR_COLOR = "red" GPBAR_COLOR = "yellow" XPBAR_COLOR = "lightblue" BURDENBAR_COLOR = "purple"
MAXXP = 200000 --max xp in bar
GUI = GUI or {}

Script.name: Set Borders
Script.script: local w,h = getMainWindowSize() setBorderLeft(w/4) setBorderTop(h/10) setBorderBottom(h/10) setBorderRight(w/4)

Script.name: Create Background
Header Icons

ScriptGroup.name: Boxes
ScriptGroup.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- GUI.BoxCSS = CSSMan.new([[ background-color: rgba(0,0,0,100); border-style: solid; border-width: 1px; border-radius: 10px; border-color: white; margin: 10px; ]]) GUI.Box1 = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "GUI.Box1", x = 0, y = "50%", width = "100%", height = "25%", },GUI.Left) GUI.Box1:setStyleSheet(GUI.BoxCSS:getCSS()) GUI.Box1:echo("
GUI.Box1

(Satchel)") satchelconsole = satchelconsole or Geyser.MiniConsole:new({name = "satchelconsole"},GUI.Box1) satchelconsole:set_constraints({x = 20, y = 20, width="88%", height="76%"}) satchelconsole:setColor(SATCHELBGCOLOR) setMiniConsoleFontSize("satchelconsole",SATCHELFONTSIZE) setWindowWrap("satchelconsole",SATCHELLINEWRAP) setBold(satchelconsole.name,true) --[[ GUI.Box2 = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "GUI.Box2", x = "50%", y = 0, width = "50%", height = "25%", },GUI.Left) GUI.Box2:setStyleSheet(GUI.BoxCSS:getCSS()) GUI.Box2:echo("

GUI.Box2

(Cloak)") cloakconsole = cloakconsole or Geyser.MiniConsole:new({name = "cloakconsole"},GUI.Box2) cloakconsole:set_constraints({x = 20, y = 20, width="76%", height="76%"}) cloakconsole:setColor(CLOAKBGCOLOR) setMiniConsoleFontSize("cloakconsole",CLOAKFONTSIZE) setWindowWrap("cloakconsole",CLOAKLINEWRAP) --]] GUI.Box3 = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "GUI.Box3", x = 0, y = 0, width = "100%", height = "50%", },GUI.Left) GUI.Box3:setStyleSheet(GUI.BoxCSS:getCSS()) GUI.Box3:echo("

GUI.Box3

(Map)") mapconsole = mapconsole or Geyser.MiniConsole:new({name = "mapconsole"},GUI.Box3) mapconsole:set_constraints({x = 20, y = 20, width="88%", height="88%"}) mapconsole:setColor(MAPBGCOLOR) mapconsole:setFontSize(MAPFONTSIZE) setBold(mapconsole.name,MAPISBOLD) GUI.Box4 = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "GUI.Box4", x = 0, y = "75%", width = "100%", height = "25%", },GUI.Left) GUI.Box4:setStyleSheet(GUI.BoxCSS:getCSS()) GUI.Box4:echo("

GUI.Box4

(Inventory)") iconsole = iconsole or Geyser.MiniConsole:new({name = "iconsole"},GUI.Box4) iconsole:set_constraints({x = 20, y = 20, width="88%", height="76%"}) iconsole:setColor(INVENTORYBGCOLOR) setMiniConsoleFontSize("iconsole",INVENTORYFONTSIZE) setWindowWrap("iconsole",INVENTORYLINEWRAP) GUI.Box5 = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "GUI.Box5", x = "0%", y = "0%", width = "100%", height = "35%", },GUI.Right) GUI.Box5:setStyleSheet(GUI.BoxCSS:getCSS()) GUI.Box5:echo("

GUI.Box5

(Score)") scoreconsole = scoreconsole or Geyser.MiniConsole:new({name = "scoreconsole"},GUI.Box5) scoreconsole:set_constraints({x = 20, y = 20, width="88%", height="84%"}) scoreconsole:setColor(SCOREBGCOLOR) setMiniConsoleFontSize("scoreconsole",SCOREFONTSIZE) setWindowWrap("scoreconsole",SCORELINEWRAP) --[[ --use this one for friend chat GUI.Box5 = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "GUI.Box5", x = "0%", y = "50%", width = "100%", height = "50%", },GUI.Right) GUI.Box5:setStyleSheet(GUI.BoxCSS:getCSS()) GUI.Box5:echo("

GUI.Box5") chatconsole = chatconsole or Geyser.MiniConsole:new({name = "chatconsole"},GUI.Box5) chatconsole:set_constraints({x = 20, y = 20, width="88%", height="88%"}) chatconsole:setColor(CHATBGCOLOR) setMiniConsoleFontSize("chatconsole",CHATFONTSIZE) setWindowWrap("chatconsole",CHATLINEWRAP) --]] GUI.Box6 = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "GUI.Box6", x = "0%", y = "35%", width = "100%", height = "65%", },GUI.Right) GUI.Box6:setStyleSheet(GUI.BoxCSS:getCSS()) GUI.Box6:echo("
GUI.Box6") chatconsole = chatconsole or Geyser.MiniConsole:new({name = "chatconsole"},GUI.Box6) chatconsole:set_constraints({x = 20, y = 20, width="88%", height="90%"}) chatconsole:setColor(CHATBGCOLOR) setMiniConsoleFontSize("chatconsole",CHATFONTSIZE) setWindowWrap("chatconsole",CHATLINEWRAP)

Script.name: MapEvent
Script.script:
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function MapEvent() clearWindow(mapconsole.name) map = gmcp.Window.Frame.map if USE_COLOURED_MAP_HACK and USE_COLOURED_MAP_HACK == 1337 then map = map:gsub("\e",string.char(27)) map = map:split("
") for i, s in ipairs(map) do moveCursorEnd() feedTriggers(s .. "
") selectCurrentLine() copy() appendBuffer("mapconsole") deleteLine() end else local _, count = map:gsub("\e", "") if count > 0 then mapconsole:echo("You're using coloured map
output but do no use the
coloured map hack:
") end mapconsole:echo(map) end end

ScriptGroup.name: Gauges

Script.name: VitalsEvent
Script.script: ------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- function VitalsEvent() --HP bar update GUI.Health:setValue(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp, gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) GUI.Health.back:echo(string.format("HP: [%d/%d]", gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp, gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp)) GUI.Health.front:echo(string.format("HP: [%d/%d]", gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp, gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp)) --GP bar update GUI.Guildpoints:setValue(gmcp.Char.Vitals.gp, gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxgp) GUI.Guildpoints.front:echo(string.format([[GP: [%d/%d]]], gmcp.Char.Vitals.gp, gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxgp)) --XP bar update GUI.Experience:setValue(gmcp.Char.Vitals.xp, MAXXP) GUI.Experience.back:echo(string.format([[XP: [%d/%d]]],gmcp.Char.Vitals.xp, MAXXP)) GUI.Experience.front:echo(string.format([[XP: [%d/%d]]],gmcp.Char.Vitals.xp, MAXXP)) --Burden bar update GUI.Burden:setValue(gmcp.Char.Vitals.burden, 100) GUI.Burden.back:echo(string.format("Burden: [%d/%d]", gmcp.Char.Vitals.burden, 100)) GUI.Burden.front:echo(string.format("Burden: [%d/%d]", gmcp.Char.Vitals.burden, 100)) end

Trigger.name: Take Inventory
Trigger.script:
selectCurrentLine() copy() appendBuffer("iconsole") deleteLine()
--[[ --remember to set fire length = 1000 before trying this if isFirstLine: clearWindow(iconsole.name) isFirstLine = 0 end selectCurrentLine() copy() paste("iconsole") if last line: isFirstLine = 1 setTriggerStayOpen("Gate",0) end --]]

regexCodeList.string: The medium satchel has two main pockets and one side pocket.

Trigger.name: Show Satchel Contents
Trigger.script: selectCurrentLine() copy() appendBuffer("satchelconsole") deleteLine() setTriggerStayOpen("Satchel Gate",0)
